vernac_cmds: Lemma In_Permutation_cons: forall {A : Type} (l : list A) (x : A), In x l -> exists l', Permutation l (x :: l').
Lemma incl_Permutation {A: Type}: forall (l1 l2: list A), NoDup l2 -> incl l2 l1 -> exists l', Permutation l1 (l2 ++ l').
assert (In a l1) by (apply H0; simpl; auto).
assert (incl l2 l1) by (hnf; intros; apply H0; simpl; auto).
assert (In a l3) by (rewrite H4 in H2; apply in_app_or in H2; destruct H2; [exfalso|]; auto).
Definition sepcon_unique1 {X A} `{SepLog A} (P: X -> A): Prop := forall x, P x * P x |-- FF.
Definition sepcon_unique2 {X Y A} `{SepLog A} (P: X -> Y -> A): Prop := forall x y1 y2, P x y1 * P x y2 |-- FF.
Fixpoint iter_sepcon (l : list B) : A := match l with | nil => emp | x :: xl => p x * iter_sepcon xl end.
Lemma iter_sepcon_app: forall (l1 l2 : list B), iter_sepcon (l1 ++ l2) = iter_sepcon l1 * iter_sepcon l2.
Lemma iter_sepcon_app_comm: forall (l1 l2 : list B), iter_sepcon (l1 ++ l2) = iter_sepcon (l2 ++ l1).
Lemma iter_sepcon_permutation: forall (l1 l2 : list B), Permutation l1 l2 -> iter_sepcon l1 = iter_sepcon l2.
Lemma iter_sepcon_in_true: forall (l : list B) x, In x l -> iter_sepcon l |-- p x * TT.
Lemma iter_sepcon_incl_true: forall (l s: list B), NoDup s -> incl s l -> iter_sepcon l |-- iter_sepcon s * TT.
destruct (incl_Permutation l s H H0) as [l' ?].
Lemma iter_sepcon_unique_nodup: forall (l : list B), sepcon_unique1 p -> iter_sepcon l |-- !!(NoDup l).
assert (p a * iter_sepcon l |-- !!(~ In a l)).
apply derives_trans with (p a * p a * TT).
apply derives_trans with (!!(NoDup l) && !!(~ In a l)).
Lemma iter_sepcon_emp': forall (l : list B), (forall x, In x l -> p x = emp) -> iter_sepcon l = emp.
rewrite H, IHl, sepcon_emp; simpl; auto.
Lemma iter_sepcon_emp: forall (l l' : list B), (forall x, p x |-- emp) -> NoDup l' -> incl l' l -> iter_sepcon l |-- iter_sepcon l'.
revert l H1; induction l'; intros.
assert (In a l) by (specialize (H1 a); simpl in H1; auto).
rewrite in_app_iff in H1; simpl in H1.
assert (a = x -> False) by (intros; subst; tauto).
Lemma iter_sepcon_func: forall l P Q, (forall x, P x = Q x) -> iter_sepcon P l = iter_sepcon Q l.
Lemma iter_sepcon_func_strong: forall l P Q, (forall x, In x l -> P x = Q x) -> iter_sepcon P l = iter_sepcon Q l.
Instance iter_sepcon_permutation_proper : Proper ((pointwise_relation B eq) ==> (@Permutation B) ==> eq) iter_sepcon.
Lemma iter_sepcon_map: forall {A B C: Type} {ND : NatDed A} {SL : SepLog A} (l : list C) (f : B -> A) (g: C -> B), iter_sepcon (fun x : C => f (g x)) l = iter_sepcon f (map g l).
Definition uncurry {A B C} (f: A -> B -> C) (xy: A*B) : C := f (fst xy) (snd xy).

Fixpoint iter_sepcon2 (l : list B1) : list B2 -> A := match l with | nil => fun l2 => match l2 with | nil => emp | _ => FF end | x :: xl => fun l' => match l' with | nil => FF | y :: yl => p x y * iter_sepcon2 xl yl end end.
Lemma iter_sepcon2_spec: forall l1 l2, iter_sepcon2 l1 l2 = EX l: list (B1 * B2), !! (l1 = map fst l /\ l2 = map snd l) && iter_sepcon (uncurry p) l.
revert l2; induction l1; intros; destruct l2.
eapply derives_trans; [apply sepcon_derives; [apply derives_refl | apply IHl1] | clear IHl1].
eapply derives_trans; [apply sepcon_derives; [apply derives_refl | apply IHl] | clear IHl].
Definition pred_sepcon (p: B -> A) (P: B -> Prop): A := EX l: list B, !! (forall x, In x l <-> P x) && !! NoDup l && iter_sepcon p l.
Lemma pred_sepcon_eq: forall (P: B -> Prop) (p: B -> A), pred_sepcon p P = (EX l: list B, !! ((forall x, In x l <-> P x) /\ NoDup l) && iter_sepcon p l).
Lemma pred_sepcon_strong_proper: forall P1 P2 p1 p2, (forall x, P1 x <-> P2 x) -> (forall x, P1 x -> P2 x -> p1 x = p2 x) -> pred_sepcon p1 P1 = pred_sepcon p2 P2.
assert (forall P1 P2 p1 p2, (forall x, P1 x <-> P2 x) -> (forall x, P1 x -> P2 x -> p1 x = p2 x) -> pred_sepcon p1 P1 |-- pred_sepcon p2 P2).
2: intros; apply pred_ext; apply H; [auto | auto | symmetry; auto | symmetry; auto].
apply exp_left; intro l; apply (exp_right l).
assert (forall x : B, In x l <-> P2 x) by (intros; rewrite H1, H; reflexivity).
Instance pred_sepcon_proper: Proper (pointwise_relation B eq ==> pointwise_relation B iff ==> eq) pred_sepcon.
Lemma pred_sepcon1: forall p x0, pred_sepcon p (fun x => x = x0) = p x0.
assert (b = x0) by tauto; subst b.
pose proof proj1 (H b) as HH; simpl in HH.
pose proof proj1 (H b0) as HH; simpl in HH.
Lemma pred_sepcon_unique_sepcon1: forall (P: B -> Prop) p x0, sepcon_unique1 p -> pred_sepcon p P * p x0 |-- !! (~ P x0).
eapply derives_trans; [apply sepcon_derives; [apply iter_sepcon_in_true; eauto| apply derives_refl] |].
eapply derives_trans; [apply sepcon_derives; [apply H | apply derives_refl] |].
Lemma prop_forall_allp: forall (P: B -> Prop), !! (forall x, P x) = ALL x: B, !! P x.
Lemma prop_impl_imp: forall (P Q: Prop), !! (P -> Q) = !! P --> !! Q.
Lemma pred_sepcon_prop_true: forall (P: B -> Prop) p x, P x -> pred_sepcon p P |-- p x * TT.
Lemma pred_sepcon_False: forall p, pred_sepcon p (fun _ => False) = emp.
specialize (H b); simpl in H; tauto.

command: assert (In a l1) by (apply H0; simpl; auto).
assert (incl l2 l1) by (hnf; intros; apply H0; simpl; auto).
assert (In a l3) by (rewrite H4 in H2; apply in_app_or in H2; destruct H2; [exfalso|]; auto).
destruct (incl_Permutation l s H H0) as [l' ?].
assert (p a * iter_sepcon l |-- !!(~ In a l)).
apply derives_trans with (p a * p a * TT).
apply derives_trans with (!!(NoDup l) && !!(~ In a l)).
rewrite H, IHl, sepcon_emp; simpl; auto.
revert l H1; induction l'; intros.
assert (In a l) by (specialize (H1 a); simpl in H1; auto).
rewrite in_app_iff in H1; simpl in H1.
assert (a = x -> False) by (intros; subst; tauto).
revert l2; induction l1; intros; destruct l2.
eapply derives_trans; [apply sepcon_derives; [apply derives_refl | apply IHl1] | clear IHl1].
eapply derives_trans; [apply sepcon_derives; [apply derives_refl | apply IHl] | clear IHl].
assert (b = x0) by tauto; subst b.
pose proof proj1 (H b) as HH; simpl in HH.
pose proof proj1 (H b0) as HH; simpl in HH.
eapply derives_trans; [apply sepcon_derives; [apply iter_sepcon_in_true; eauto| apply derives_refl] |].
eapply derives_trans; [apply sepcon_derives; [apply H | apply derives_refl] |].
specialize (H b); simpl in H; tauto.
